      const override = (new URL(window.location)).searchParams.get('sentryOverride');
      if (override || Math.floor(Math.random() * 100) <= 1) {
        document.write('<script src="https://js.sentry-cdn.com/7bc8bccf5c254286a99b11c68f6bf4ce.min.js" crossorigin="anonymous">' + '<' + '/script>');
      }
    </script>

      if (window.Sentry) {
        window.Sentry.onLoad(function() {
          window.Sentry.init({
            maxBreadcrumbs: 30,
            release: '547d4fc7c17f0f1e10bc31d84043818f74e2bf41',
            environment: 'prd',
            beforeSend: function(evt, hint) {
              if (/amazon-adsystem|ads-us|ampproject|amp4ads|pubads|2mdn|chartbeat|gsi|bk_addPageCtx|yimg|BOOMR|boomerang/.test(hint.originalException && hint.originalException.stack || '')) return null;
              return evt;
            },
            
            beforeSendTransaction(evt) {
              evt.transaction = 'homepage';
              return evt;
            },
          });
        });
      }
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">(function fidesScript(staticAssetURL, win) {
  var FIDES_ID = 'nyt-fides';
  var FIDES_INDEX = 16;
  var LOOKUP_NAME = 'nyt-purr=';
  var OVERRIDE_NAME = 'override-purr=';
  var searchStrObj = new URLSearchParams(win.location.search);
  var getCookieVal = function getCookieVal(name) {
    var purrVal = win.document.cookie.split(';').find(function (cookie) {
      return cookie.includes(name);
    }) || '';
    return purrVal.replace(name, '').trim().charAt(FIDES_INDEX);
  };
  var isFidesEligible = function isFidesEligible() {
    var _win$config, _win$config$tc_info, _win$config$tc_info$f;
    var fidesOverride = searchStrObj.get('fides-override');
    var fidesTCF = getCookieVal(LOOKUP_NAME);
    var overrideTCF = getCookieVal(OVERRIDE_NAME);
    var hasTCInfo = ((_win$config = win.config) === null || _win$config === void 0 ? void 0 : (_win$config$tc_info = _win$config.tc_info) === null || _win$config$tc_info === void 0 ? void 0 : (_win$config$tc_info$f = _win$config$tc_info.fides_string) === null || _win$config$tc_info$f === void 0 ? void 0 : _win$config$tc_info$f.length) > 0;
    return hasTCInfo || overrideTCF === 's' || fidesTCF === 's' || fidesOverride === 'true';
  };
  var hasFidesLoaded = function hasFidesLoaded() {
    return win.document.getElementById(FIDES_ID) !== null;
  };
  function loadFides() {
    if (hasFidesLoaded()) {
      return;
    }
    if (isFidesEligible()) {
      var script = document.createElement('script');
      script.id = FIDES_ID;
      script.src = staticAssetURL;
      win.document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
  }
  loadFides();
  win.addEventListener('initWebview:ios', loadFides);
  win.fidesUtils = {
    isFidesEligible: isFidesEligible
  };
})('https://static01.nyt.com/vi-assets/static-assets/fides-2ea5b925a21d7a1a63b172ae611198b0.js', window);</script>

  (function initWebUnifiedTracking(root) {
  var _root;
  root = root || (typeof window !== 'undefined' ? window : undefined);
  var UnifiedTracking = ((_root = root) === null || _root === void 0 ? void 0 : _root.UnifiedTracking) || {};
  UnifiedTracking.context = 'web';
  if (!root) {
    return UnifiedTracking;
  }
  root.UnifiedTracking = UnifiedTracking;
  UnifiedTracking.sendAnalytic = function sendAnalytic(eventName, dataBlob) {
    root.dataLayer = root.dataLayer || [];
    if (Array.isArray(root.dataLayer)) {
      // Don't use a spread operator here for babel reasons
      dataBlob.event = dataBlob.event || eventName;
      root.dataLayer.push(dataBlob);
    }
    return Promise.resolve({
      success: true
    });
  };
  return UnifiedTracking;

Friedman</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/michelle-goldberg">Michelle Goldberg</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/ezra-klein">Ezra Klein</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/nicholas-kristof">Nicholas Kristof</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/paul-krugman">Paul Krugman</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/carlos-lozada">Carlos Lozada</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/tressie-mcmillan-cottom">Tressie McMillan Cottom</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/pamela-paul">Pamela Paul</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/lydia-polgreen">Lydia Polgreen</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/bret-stephens">Bret Stephens</a></li><li><a class="css-kz1pwz" href="https://www.nytimes.com/by/zeynep-tufekci">Zeynep Tufekci</a></li></ul></div></div><div class="css-132p2yg"><div id="Opinion-thumbnail-column"><h3 id="Opinion-thumbnail-column-header" class="css-1nudrh3">Podcasts</h3><ul aria-labelledby="Opinion-thumbnail-column-header"><li><a class="css-ubypus" href="https://www.nytimes.com/column/matter-of-opinion"><img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/05/08/podcasts/matter-of-opinion-album-art/matter-of-opinion-album-art-thumbLarge-v2.jpg?quality=75&amp;auto=webp&amp;disable=upscale" alt="Matter of Opinion Logo" class=""/><div><div class="css-1xpp3bj e10k0zts0">Matter of Opinion</div><p>Thoughts, aloud. business and policy news you need to know.</p></div></a></li></ul><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/newsletters" class="css-kta6en"><p class="css-1druyfb">See all newsletters</p></a></div></div><div Times - Top Stories</h1><div data-hierarchy="feed" data-testid="programming-node"><div class="css-556854 e1ppw5w20"><div class="css-m5ahyg"><div span="14" class="css-1l10c03 e17qa79g0"><div><div data-hierarchy="zone" data-testid="programming-node"><div class="css-5bh64l e1ppw5w20"><div class="css-1dz6m7o e1ppw5w20"><div class="css-1lvvmm"><div span="14" class="css-1l10c03 e17qa79g0"><div class="css-hep49k e1yccyp20"><div class="css-1lvvmm"><div span="5" class="css-1432v6n e17qa79g0"><div class="css-hep49k e1yccyp20"><section class="story-wrapper"><a class="css-9mylee" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2024/02/18/world/europe/russian-opposition-in-exile.html" data-uri="nyt://article/c620c3c8-c8f4-523c-8b05-300584aca8a5" aria-hidden="false"><div><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-vf1hbp">Russia’s Shocked Opposition Considers a Future Without Navalny</p></div><p class="summary-class css-fkntuz">The death of Aleksei Navalny has been a blow to Russia’s opposition movement. But it has also raised hopes of a united front against President Vladimir Putin.</p><p class="css-og0y9l" data-ttr="1">5 min read</p></div></a></section><section class="story-wrapper"><a class="css-9mylee" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2024/02/17/world/europe/navalny-health-prison-death.html" data-uri="nyt://article/c1d58cc0-7166-54c0-abed-128f0a7f8497" aria-hidden="false"><div><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-1gb49m4">Aleksei Navalny’s staff had worried that brutal conditions imposed in ever crueler Russian prisons might lead to his death.</p></div><p class="css-og0y9l" data-ttr="1">6 min read</p></div></a></section></div></div><div span="9" class="css-1e7omub e17qa79g0"><figure class="container-margin css-hurk9l"><a class="css-9mylee" aria-hidden="false"><div><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-66vf3i">The Death Throes of a Ukrainian City</p></div><p class="summary-class css-8h5y1w">“It didn’t stop. It just got worse,” said one resident of Avdiivka, a city that Russia decimated. Ukraine withdrew after months of horrific fighting.</p><p class="css-og0y9l" data-ttr="1">6 min read</p></div></a></section><section class="story-wrapper"><a class="css-9mylee" Now he is challenging Senator Deb Fischer as an independent in deep-red Nebraska.</p><p class="css-og0y9l" data-ttr="1">7 min read</p></div></a></section><section class="story-wrapper"><a class="css-9mylee" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2024/02/17/us/politics/how-two-first-ladies-weathered-a-most-unusual-presidential-transition.html" data-uri="nyt://article/8ffe54fa-f8d6-5e5b-b712-49c744b253e2" aria-hidden="false"><div><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-66vf3i">How 2 First Ladies Weathered a Most Unusual Presidential Transition</p></div><p class="summary-class css-8h5y1w">Jill Biden wanted to keep teaching. Melania Trump just wanted to go home. In nearly every way, the two women are a study in contrasts.</p><p class="css-og0y9l" data-ttr="1">7 min read</p></div></a></section></div></div><div span="9" class="css-1e7omub e17qa79g0"><figure class="container-margin css-hurk9l"><a class="css-9mylee" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2024/02/18/us/politics/nebraska-union-senate-race.html" data-uri="nyt://article/5478d6eb-f487-5f57-86ef-4668680c9b37" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><div class="css-ho9dtj"><picture class="css-hdqqnp"><source class="css-hdqqnp" media="screen and (min-width: 601px)"/><img class="css-dzl7b5" alt="Dan Osborn, wearing a patterned button down and a cap, stands in his garage in front of a car with an open hood." loading="lazy"/><noscript><img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2024/02/16/multimedia/00pol-nebraska-top-wcvl/00pol-nebraska-top-wcvl-threeByTwoMediumAt2X.jpg?format=pjpg&amp;quality=75&amp;auto=webp&amp;disable=upscale" alt="Dan Osborn, wearing a patterned button down and a cap, stands in his garage in front of a car with an open hood." class="css-122y91a"/></noscript></picture></div><figcaption class="css-1p5yz2j" aria-hidden="true"><span class="css-1j306sm">David Robert Elliott for The New York Times</span></figcaption></a></figure></div></div><div class="css-1lvvmm"><div span="7" class="css-10kglqe e17qa79g0"><section class="story-wrapper"><a class="css-9mylee" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2024/02/18/us/politics/haley-trump-gop.html" data-uri="nyt://article/487b4b69-6a5b-5d6f-a714-8fe4dc20acd4" aria-hidden="false"><div><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-1gb49m4">The odds are against it, but Nikki Haley says she’s going the distance against Donald Trump. span="5" class="css-f52tr7 e17qa79g0"><section class="story-wrapper"><div><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-66vf3i">Besieged Gaza Hospital ‘Not Functional,’ W.H.O. Director Says</p></div><p class="summary-class css-8h5y1w">The head of the U.N. agency said at least 20 of the 200 patients at the complex in Khan Younis, which Israeli forces raided last week, needed urgent care.</p></div><p class="css-ikai89"> </p></section></div><div span="9" class="css-1e7omub e17qa79g0"><figure class="container-margin css-hurk9l"><div class="css-ho9dtj"><picture class="css-hdqqnp"><source class="css-hdqqnp" media="screen and (min-width: 601px)"/><img class="css-dzl7b5" alt="A man in a brown jacket comforts another man who is kneeling in the dirt. But now it’s cracking down on ones that some argue go overboard with flattering phrases.</p><p class="css-og0y9l" data-ttr="1">5 min read</p></div></section></div><div span="9" class="css-1e7omub e17qa79g0"><figure class="container-margin css-hurk9l"><div class="css-ho9dtj"><picture class="css-hdqqnp"><source class="css-hdqqnp" media="screen and (min-width: 601px)"/><img class="css-dzl7b5" alt="A Chinese language ballot in San Francisco in 2020." loading="lazy"/><noscript><img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2024/02/18/multimedia/18nat-chinese-ballot-zklt/18nat-chinese-ballot-zklt-threeByTwoMediumAt2X.jpg?format=pjpg&amp;quality=75&amp;auto=webp&amp;disable=upscale" alt="A Chinese language ballot in San Francisco in 2020." class="css-122y91a"/></noscript></picture></div><figcaption class="css-1p5yz2j" aria-hidden="true"><span class="css-1j306sm">Jim Wilson/The New York Times</span></figcaption></figure></div></div></a></section></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="css-1dz6m7o e1ppw5w20"><div class="css-1lvvmm"><div span="14" class="css-1l10c03 e17qa79g0"><div class="css-hep49k e1yccyp20"><div class="css-1lvvmm"><div span="14" class="css-1l10c03 e17qa79g0"><section class="story-wrapper"><a class="css-9mylee" href="https://www.nytimes.com/2024/02/18/nyregion/remington-guns-ny-georgia.html" data-uri="nyt://article/a5df7dbe-9377-566f-a450-c79582616c26" aria-hidden="false"><div class="css-1lvvmm"><div span="5" class="css-f52tr7 e17qa79g0"><section class="story-wrapper"><div><div class="css-xdandi"><p class="indicate-hover css-66vf3i">What Happens to a Gun Town When the Gun Factory Moves Out?</p></div><p class="summary-class css-8h5y1w">Remington is leaving Ilion, N.Y., after two centuries, abandoning upstate for a gleaming new factory in Georgia. With it goes the village’s identity.</p><p class="css-og0y9l" data-ttr="1">6 min read</p></div></section></div><div span="9" class="css-1e7omub e17qa79g0"><figure class="container-margin a(){var a=document.querySelector(\"nav[aria-labelledby=\\\"styln-trump-investigation-hp-menu\\\"]\"),b=document.querySelectorAll(\"[data-hierarchy=\\\"zone\\\"]\"),c=Array.from(b).filter(function(b){return b.contains(a)})[0];if(c&&a.clientWidth\u003Ec.clientWidth)\u002F\u002F remove the last item from the menu if it is overflowing\n{var d=a.querySelectorAll(\"li\"),e=d[d.length-1];e.remove()}}\u002F\u002F only check for overflow if the user is on desktop or tablet\n\u002F\u002F remove links that match ones already shown in the live band\nvar b=document.querySelector(\"#hp-live-band-list\");if(b){var c=Array.from(b.querySelectorAll(\"a\")).map(function(b){return b.href}),d=document.querySelectorAll(\"nav[aria-labelledby=\\\"styln-trump-investigation-hp-menu\\\"] li\");d.forEach(function(a){var b=a.querySelector(\"a\"),d=b.pathname;c.forEach(function(b){b.includes(d)&&a.remove()})})}if(!window.matchMedia(\"(pointer: coarse) and (max-width: 739px)\").matches){a();var
